page.title: 07FLAXYARDS FARM,TARPORLEY.
page.content: Flaxyards Farm is managed by{Mr. {Benson}for{Mr.J.A. Lilley.}It is the largest farm in our area with approximately 25 fields which cover 520 acres. This is a{Dairy Farm}with 400 cows in milk, 200 bullocks and 400 young heifers.It is a pedigree Friesian herd - numerous cups and other awards have been won by different cattle in the herd,at various Agricultural Shows. The{Milk Quota}for this farm is 2,326,241 litres per year.The cows are milked three times each day, at 5.30 a.m. 2.00 p.m. and 9.00 p.m. The milk is collected by the Bulk Milk tanker. There is a very large Milking Parlour and the cows are fed with silage made on the farm. Mr. Benson visits{Beeston Market once a week and{Crewe Market}once a month to sell cattle.
